channel.title: shitflation on Over to you
channel.description: Recent content in shitflation on Over to you

item.title: Can we Fight Shitflation?
item.description: Someone recently made a good video on the topic of "Shitflation": The video made some great points, but I was a bit disappointed that it ended on a sort of "there’s not much we can do, oh well" note, and wrote the following comment which I’d like to repeat here: I was disappointed with the end of the video: it isn’t true that there’s nothing we can do. Here’s what we can do:
